headline: Synopsys (SNPS) Q4 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: Us today are Sassine Ghazi, President and CEO of Synopsys, Inc. and Shelagh Glaser, CFO.  Tushar Jain: Before we begin, I'd like to remind everyone that during the course of this conference call, Synopsys, Inc. will discuss forecasts, targets, and other forward-looking statements regarding the company and its financial results.  As shown in today's financial statements, all of ANSYS revenue appears under the ANSYS product group, including the ANSYS semiconductor products.
